plays.text: Goal scored by Matt Bradley assisted by Mike Rathje and Kyle McLaren

Goal scored by Teemu Selanne assisted by Niko Dimitrakos
Penalty to Craig Berube 2 minutes for Crosschecking Vincent Damphousse
Penalty to Jarome Iginla 2 minutes for Crosschecking Patrick Marleau
Goal scored by Vincent Damphousse assisted by Jim Fahey and Marco Sturm
Goal scored by Dave Lowry assisted by Jarome Iginla and Denis Gauthier
